article_title: The Supreme Court Removes One Raisin Of The Smothering New Deal Legacy

article_metadata.description: According to conventional U.S. history texts, Franklin Roosevelt’s New Deal ended sometime in the late 1930’s.  Unfortunately, that is one more urban myth that needs to be exposed on Snopes.com. To our detriment, the New Deal is alive and well, still serving as the basic framework for U.S. domestic and [...]
article_metadata.author: David Davenport
